item.title: Lei Zhang
item.description: About This Website Hello, thanks for your interest in my website. ðŸ˜Š I try to log down my learnings and thoughts about compilers (SPIR-V, MLIR, etc.), GPU (Vulkan, Metal, etc.), toolchain (ML frameworks, productivity tools, etc.), and others sporadically. About Me I’m Lei Zhang. I work on machine learning compilers and runtime within Google. Currently my main focus is exploring a standards- and compilation-based approach towards ML inference on various GPUs, leveraging GPU APIs like Vulkan and IRs like SPIR-V and the MLIR infrastructure.
